newsitem.title: USA: ESCO to make $3/shr payout, buy back stock.
newsitem.headline: ESCO to make $3/shr payout, buy back stock.

text.p: ESCO Electronics Corp said on Wednesday that its board of directors approved a special $3 a share cash distribution and the repurchase of up to two million shares of stock.

"After reviewing various options for returning a portion of the proceeds to our shareholders from the previously announced sale of Hazeltine to GEC-Marconi Electronic Systems, the board has declared a special cash distribution," said Dennis Moore, chairman and chief executive officer.

"Combining the special cash distribution with the open market repurchase program allows us to provide our shareholders an immediate cash return in a tax advantaged manner and at the same time, provide maximum protection to the value of our" net operating loss carryforward, Moore said in a news release.
